text: Biden's Age, Economic Worries Endanger Re-Election in 2024, WSJ Poll Finds  —  Nearly three-quarters of voters say the president is too old to run again  —  Voters overwhelmingly think President Biden is too old to run for re-election and give him low marks for handling the economy …

Biden gets low marks on economy and major concerns about his age as he looks to Trump rematch, new poll shows  — Most respondents in a new poll said they think Joe Biden is too old to run for president, while a smaller majority said the same about former President Donald Trump, a new poll showed.
